attributes.title: NEVER AGAIN
attributes.review:
I got a whole virus from this app 🙄🙄🙄 not playing around. It messed up all my anime, dog, cat, goat, cat, BIRDS🙄🙄, reptile, women on men, men on women, women on women, man on man, WOMEN ON WOMEN ON WOMEN was a huge liss🙄🙄🙄, men on men on men on dog on woman and TRANS, dog on cat, goat on dog, dog on goat😤😤, lizard on butterfly, spongebob, the Smurf’s on,  smurfs, trump supporter on trump supports🤬🤬🤬 now y’all crossed the line on that one. I LOST EVERYTHING THANKS TO THIS APP. NEVEN AGAIN I SAY. I even lost the nude picture of trump, it was so elegant and sexy but now it’s gone, forever............. so what u guess I’m saying is, please don’t get this app it will ruin your life. TRUMP 2020

(But on a grave stone)

attributes.title: yeah❤️
attributes.review: i downloaded this app as an escape 😰as a white straight man in america in these recent months I have faced to much adversity 💔i always new at least I could run to my lord trump❤️, my hot fine piece of delectable cheeto 🥵🍊 but after opening the app 📱 I was startled 😱not only did i immediately get spammed with thousands upon millions upon hundreds of pop ups 🤯the face of a racist🍊 popped up right at me😩😖this app is too scary, I wanted to use it to teach my children of the great history of their land 🇺🇸#MAGA but sadly this faked tanned Cheeto scared the racism right out of me 😤😭#BLACKLIVESMATTER

attributes.title: absolutely disappointed
attributes.review: this app is made by a racist and homophobic person who rapes minors. trump is a TERRIBLE person and i’m tired of no one listening to us minors when we voice our opinions. donald trump is a terrible person with terrible views and in no way shape or form deserves to be president. so apple isn’t looking to great keeping his app up on the app story. don’t forget to go report trumps twitter, leave a bad review on his app, and go put a bunch of his merch in your cart but don’t buy it. it’s our future and we don’t need trump deciding. #dumptrump

attributes.title: Please stop harrassing Trump
attributes.review: As a fellow trump supporter it has come to my attention that people who download this app have had trouble with it. I’m very sorry to say this but everything was going smoothly, loving the app! But then it started to glitch and show quotes from him that are just so UNBELIEVABLY disgusting. I am completely and utterly at a loss for words!! one quote goes and followed, “ Laziness is a trait in blacks. It really is, I believe it’s not anything they can control.” I DID NOT know that he was Racist and I will now be retracting from and sort of support to Donald J. Trump.

attributes.title: Help
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to help out my wonderful president Obama, but sadly when I opened the app it was nothing but Donald J. Trump. Well I’m making a review and then deleting it, due to the fact that i’m now being followed. I know it sounds crazy. But every day after walking home from my local barber shop i see an old man staggering toward me so i have to sprint home. this started happening the day after i got the app. the man yells, “trump 2020” as if i’m voting for him a second time lol. don’t get this app unless you have a death wish.

attributes.title: Doesn’t work AT ALL
attributes.review:
I downloaded it to keep up with trump, but as soon as I tried logging in it stopped working. I tried again and if finally worked. As I read some articles they were fake to Trumps pleasing. I feel as our president he should do a better job at least try and make the news look real. This is a disgrace to the apple industry to even put this disgusting app on here. As gen-Z I’m here to make a change so our kids don’t have to have to read this garbage. 
Did trump make America great? 
No❤️

attributes.title: This app gave me a terminal tumor
attributes.review: As everyone knows I’m in love with our LOVELY!! AMAZING!! PRESIDENT!! So much so that when I knew he had an app I HAD to get it. The moment I clicked on it I fainted and had a ~ViSIoN~ of our lovely president writing into law an executive order to protect statues of known racists, as I awoke from that beautiful moment I felt a mass arise in my temporal lobe. After my doctor examined me he said IGNORANCE was seeping toxic pus all over my brain and that it’s terminal. I can only conclude this was the fault of this app which surely is beautiful because our beautiful president payed for it. 🥵🥵🥵🧜‍♀️

attributes.title: my dog bit me
attributes.review: the other day i was searching this fine appstore as someone my age does and happened across this app, i downloaded it as i love old people a toupees but as soon as i opened the app my dog started growling at me and then he yelled “OPRAH 2020” i was confused of course because my dog has not spoken to me in years after a fight we had but my confusion was interrupted by him yet again screaming “OPRAH 2020” this time sprouting human arms, he kept screaming “OPRAH 2020 OPRAH 2020” each time becoming more human like, then he bit my member clean off!!! and i died!!! bad app 1 star>:(
